questionTitle: Which component is used to compile, debug and execute the java programs?
Which environment variable is used to set the java path?
What is not the use of “this” keyword in Java?
option1: Referring to the instance variable when a local variable has the same name
option2: Passing itself to the method of the same class
option4: Calling another constructor in constructor chaining
rightAnswer: Passing itself to the method of the same class

option2: b cannot contain value 100, limited by its range
option4: * operator has converted b * 50 into int, which can not be converted to byte without casting
rightAnswer: * operator has converted b * 50 into int, which can not be converted to byte without casting

questionTitle: Which of the following is a type of polymorphism in Java Programming?

option1: Floating-point value assigned to a Floating type
option2: Floating-point value assigned to an integer type
option3: Integer value assigned to floating type
option4: Integer value assigned to floating type
rightAnswer: Floating-point value assigned to an integer type
